name: Indian Train Racing Simulator
description:
Welcome Train driver in this traditional Indian Train Driving Simulator 2018. Play Indian Train Driving Simulator Pro to become a real train driver of 2018. This game gives you realistic train driving simulator experience on crowded Indian railway stations. Indian Train Simulator pro is perfect fun for train enthusiasts, train lovers & kids who love to play train games. Come and drive all kinds and genres of Indian train express with realistic indian trains horn sound. Download this game to fulfill the need to handle the trains on the railroad. Enjoy the crazy train mania in this train sim tycoon.

FEATURES:

- Drive Bullet Train Simulator 3D
- Perfect 3D graphics and well-detailed environment
- Four different environments and weathers
- Great dynamic game play
- Swipe left and right to take turns
- .Different camera angles like Indoor, Overhead, God's Eye, Signal Camera Angle.
- Stunning rail sound effects and train horn sound.
- Endless Fun for Both Adults & Kids
- Enjoy six different types of trains
